price: 61. (Bakozala) na elanga ya edeni eye Ar-Rahmân alakaki yango bawumbu naye, baye bandimaki na (mabombami na yango). Ya soló, elaka naye ezali na tembe te.
arabic: جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٍ ٱلَّتِي وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ عِبَادَهُۥ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَأۡتِيّٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: jannāti ʿadnin allatī waʿada al-raḥmānu ʿibādahu bil-ghaybi innahu kāna waʿduhu matiyyan
